text: in a landmark moment in the fight

monday

it's also been announced that the
immunization campaign will now shift to
giving as many people as possible
their first dose of the vaccine with a
gap of up to 12 weeks before the second
dose is administered

that's enough for 50 million people
compared to other vaccines being

since being designed in april it's been
